overview: Fauzi, a bachelor who wants to be a tobacco farmer. Because of his selfishness, misery befell him and his closest. Yoyon, who works for Fauzi's father, has a will to heal his sick wife. Yoyon's inability to fulfill that, made him ruthless and have a guts to kill his wife. Pak Mul, a tobacco broker who tries to be free from financial problems must accept his fate if he incure losses. And complicated family problems, drives him crazy.
title: Bhàko: The Golden Leaf
